mapping.eigenschappen: [{% set index=0 %}{% for key, attribute in instance.attributes %}{% if index != 0 %},{% endif %}{% set data = {'name': key, 'value': attribute} %}{{ map('https://development.zaaksysteem.nl/mapping/xxllnc.XxllncValueToZaakEigenschapp.mapping.json', data)|json_encode }}{% set index=index+1 %}{% endfor %}]
mapping.rollen: [{% set index=0 %}{% for row in instance.assignee.instance.subject.instance.positions.instance.rows %}{% if index != 0 %},{% endif %}{% set dataRol = {'requestor': instance.requestor, 'role': row} %}{{ map('https://development.zaaksysteem.nl/mapping/xxllnc.XxllncRoleRequestorToRoll.mapping.json', dataRol)|json_encode }}{% set index=index+1 %}{% endfor %}]
